ComicInfo.Summary:
"SOMETHING TO FEAR" continues!
In the aftermath of the events of the monumental 100th issue... things are not going well.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creators | Sidebar Location | |-----------|----------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------|------------------| | 1 | Regular Cover | Charlie Adlard (a) & Cliff Rathburn (c) | 1 | | 2 | Ghost Variant 1970's Retro Exclusive Variant Cover | Jim Rugg | 2 | | 2nd Print | 2nd Print Cover | Charlie Adlard | 3 | | | | | |
Note: The second (and third) printings of issues #97-102 connect to create a giant landscape of Negan and Lucille.
